title: How to get my music noticed - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want your music to be noticed, you first need to upload your music to the corresponding platform. I would recommend Spotify as a music platform. The number of users is large and the audience is wide. According to Spotify's big data research, music that gets more views and plays is more likely to be noticed by people. In the early stage, we can use the Αio-Sтream-Вoт to quickly increase views and plays. It can be used to automatically play music, automatically like, comment on music, and follow music. It allows you to manage multiple Spotify accounts. You can use one account to search for users who are interested in your music and use another account to send them private messages. Allows you to increase views and plays in a short time. Only after the data is good can you attract more people to listen to your music.

Get out there. Play gigs. Do them for free if need be. Charity events, local festivals anything to give you a platform. Send your music to local radio stations. Keep sending them. Put your music on sound cloud, YouTube as these are free, whereas Spotify premium is a paid subscription. Open social media account specifically for your music. Follow/interact with people who have a keen interest in music. What's your band called. I have Spotify, I will give you a listen. Don't give up!

SoundCloud is easier to spread free music (ime). Just upload it, put a link on all your social media, and the views will roll in. It seems that SoundCloud has some sort of algorithm for showing people new music that fits their categories if other people are listening to it, so the views tend to increase exponentially for a short period of time, then die out until you post it on social media again.

There is a way to exist in this world. I strongly believe that if you have a great product (great music in this case), you will see the result from it. You just have to finding your own moment and having the music be great. There is not a lot a great music to choose from so when somebody is great, the world will let you know. There are people on Internet who are searching everyday, looking to the next big thing. If your product is something that nobody else has done, you will be the next guy. As an artist, you have to ask yourself why people should listen to your music.

Let your video to get shared in as many groups as possible. Stretch your boundaries .. Networking is key you need people from different groups, fields , areas and obviously good taste. Definetly one day if your music is best it will reach good number of people and create hype in the social media. Have belief in your talent and work hard. Good luck!
